meanings.definition: Moving or trending downward in a graph or chart.
meanings.sent1: The downtrending line on the graph indicated a decrease.
meanings.sent2: The stock market has been downtrending for the past week.
meanings.sent3: The downtrending sales numbers made the boss frown.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as downtrending as the red line on the chart.
meanings.sent5: The downtrending arrow pointed towards lower numbers.

meanings.definition: Showing a decrease or decline in value or performance.
meanings.sent1: The downtrending prices of houses worried the real estate agent.
meanings.sent2: The downtrending grades on his report card concerned his parents.
meanings.sent3: The downtrending energy levels made him reach for a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was as downtrending as the falling numbers on the screen.
meanings.sent5: The downtrending profits signaled a need for change in the company.
